content:
Based on the provided book review, how would you rate it on a scale of 1 to 5 using the following criteria: 
- Engaging Plot [XML data: <plot_rating>]
- Writing Style [XML data: <writing_rating>]
- Overall Enjoyment [XML data: <enjoyment_rating>]
Please provide your ratings in the following format:
<plot_rating>/5 <writing_rating>/5 <enjoyment_rating>/5
<XML data code>
<review>
<plot_rating></plot_rating>
<writing_rating></writing_rating>
<enjoyment_rating></enjoyment_rating>
</review>

To provide ratings in the specified format, I would need more specific details about the book review. Please share the content or key points of the review that focus on the plot, writing style, and overall enjoyment, so I can give you an informed assessment.
